resources.string: The Kumaran Hacker Maker Designer Community is a young, student run community that believes in harnessing the power of technology to make things rather than being mere consumers.
We love feedback. Direct and incisive is how we like it. This space will allow for anonymous feedback on the app and also KHMD in general.
KHMD is all about collaboration. We\'re always looking out for partnering with students, alumni, parents and any individuals/organisation in the technology domain.
